mapper.insert: insert into product (category, pname, content, price, imgfile, thumb) values (#{category}, #{pname}, #{content}, #{price}, #{imgfile}, #{thumb})
mapper.select: select pno, category, pname, price, thumb, imgfile from product limit #{startNo}, #{pageSize}
select pno, category, pname, price, thumb, imgfile from product order by vcnt desc limit #{startNo}, #{pageSize}
select pno, category, pname, price, thumb, imgfile from product order by ocnt desc limit #{startNo}, #{pageSize}
mapper.update: update product set category=#{category}, pname=#{pname}, content=#{content}, price=#{price}, imgfile=#{imgfile}, thumb=#{thumb} where pno=#{pno}
mapper.select: select pno, category, pname, price, thumb, imgfile from product where category=#{category}
mapper.update: update product set vcnt = vcnt +1 where pno=#{pno}
update product set ocnt = ocnt +1 where pno=#{pno}
